metadata.Title: CVE-2015-4695 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
meta.h in libwmf 0.2.8.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via a crafted WMF file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-4695` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwmf-bin - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7 - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
libwmf0.2-7-gtk - 0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: tyhicks> See Debian bug for the test case and a potential fix

criterions.comment: libwmf package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.2.8.4-10.3ubuntu1.14.04.1').
